title: Hearty squash, bean and cabbage soup

ingredients.item: ½ butternut squash, peeled, deseeded, diced
410g can essential Waitrose cannellini beans, drained
½ head essential Waitrose savoy cabbage, tough stems removed, shredded

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a very large saucepan, then add the pancetta, onion and rosemary. Cook over a medium heat for 10 minutes, stirring often, until the onion has softened. Tip in the squash, stock and tomatoes; season. Simmer for 10 minutes, adding the orzo with 5 minutes to go. The orzo and squash should be just tender.  Stir the beans and shredded greens into the soup; simmer for another 2 minutes until the greens have wilted, then season to taste. Serve with crusty bread.
